p: However, similar to the current study with P. amarus, phyllanthin, hypophyllanthin, niranthin, and nirtetralin lignans observed in the aerial samples of P. niruri plants were not identified in in vitro calli of the same species, where only 3,4-methylenedioxybenzyl-3′,4′-dimethoxybenzylbutyrolactone was observed [ 22].
